title: 5-Hydroxymethylcytosine: the many faces of the sixth base of mammalian DNA
content:
Chem. Soc. Rev., 2024, 53,2264-2283
DOI: 10.1039/D3CS00858D, Tutorial Review
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported Licence.
Edita Kriukienė, Miglė Tomkuvienė, Saulius Klimašauskas
This review assesses current analytical approaches and the mechanistic, biological and biomedical significance of 5-hydroxymethylcytosine – the second most abundant modified base in mammalian DNA.
